body_html: @fchollet could you comment on this? I don't understand some of the subtleties. It looks to me as if "uses_learning_phase" is intended to indicate whether a model behaves differently during learning or inference. But I think that the "set_learning_phase" flag is just indicating whether learning or inference is being done.
